title: Privacy Policy

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.description: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.p1: Welcome to BluPresenter. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our service.
intro.p2: BluPresenter is an open-source project available on <1>GitHub</1>. We are committed to transparency and protecting your privacy. This service is provided as-is, without a formal company structure.

informationWeCollect.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.p1: When you create an account and use BluPresenter, we collect the following personal information:
list: <0>Account Information:</0> Email address, name, and nickname
<0>Authentication Data:</0> Login credentials and session information managed by our authentication provider
informationWeCollect.p2: We do <1>not</1> use analytics tools or tracking services. We only collect the minimum data necessary to provide the service.

howWeUseYourInformation.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUseYourInformation.p1: We use your information solely to:
list: Provide and maintain the BluPresenter service
Authenticate your account and manage your sessions
Communicate with you about your account or the service
howWeUseYourInformation.p2: We do <1>not</1> sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties - not for marketing, or any other purpose.

thirdPartyServices.title: 4. Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.p1: BluPresenter relies on the following third-party services:

supabase.title: Supabase
supabase.p1: We use <1>Supabase</1> for authentication and database services. Your account data and application data are stored on Supabase servers located in the <3>US East (Ohio) region (us-east-2)</3>.
supabase.p2: Supabase's privacy practices are governed by their <1>Privacy Policy</1>.

googleAuthentication.title: Google Authentication
googleAuthentication.p1: If you choose to sign in with Google, we use Google's OAuth service for authentication. Google may collect information according to their <1>Privacy Policy</1>.

cookiesAndLocalStorage.title: 5. Cookies and Local Storage
cookiesAndLocalStorage.p1: BluPresenter uses minimal cookies and browser storage:
list: <0>Authentication Cookies:</0> Used to maintain your login session
<0>Local and Session Storage:</0> Used to store your preferences and session tokens
cookiesAndLocalStorage.p2: These are essential for the service to function properly. We do not use tracking or advertising cookies.

dataSecurity.title: 6. Data Security
dataSecurity.p1: We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
dataSecurity.p2: Your data is stored securely by <1>Supabase</1>, which implements industry-standard security practices.

dataRetentionAndDeletion.title: 7. Data Retention and Deletion
dataRetentionAndDeletion.p1: Currently, we do not have an automated data retention or deletion policy. Your data remains in our system as long as your account is active.
dataRetentionAndDeletion.p2: If you wish to delete your account or have your data removed, please submit a request through our <1>GitHub Issues page</1>. We will process your request as soon as reasonably possible.

yourRights.title: 8. Your Rights
yourRights.p1: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal data, including:
list: The right to access your personal information
The right to correct inaccurate information
The right to request deletion of your data
The right to export your data
yourRights.p2: To exercise these rights, please submit a request through our <1>GitHub Issues page</1>.

internationalUsers.title: 9. International Users
internationalUsers.p1: BluPresenter is operated from Brazil and uses services hosted in the United States (Supabase - us-east-2 region). By using our service, you acknowledge that your information may be transferred to and processed in the United States.
internationalUsers.p2: We welcome users from around the world, but please be aware that data protection laws may vary by country.

childrensPrivacy.title: 10. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.p1: BluPresenter does not have a minimum age requirement. However, if you are under the age of 13 (or the minimum age in your jurisdiction), please obtain parental consent before using our service.

openSourceNature.title: 11. Open Source Nature
openSourceNature.p1: BluPresenter is an open-source project. The source code is publicly available on <1>GitHub</1>, and you can review exactly how your data is handled in the code.
openSourceNature.p2: If you choose to self-host BluPresenter, you are responsible for your own data handling and privacy practices.

changesToThisPrivacyPolicy.title: 12. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changesToThisPrivacyPolicy.p1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. When we do, we will update the "Last Updated" date at the top of this page. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.
changesToThisPrivacyPolicy.p2: Significant changes will be announced through the service or on our GitHub repository.

contactUs.title: 13. Contact Us
contactUs.p1: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact us through:

warrantyNote: <0>Note:</0> BluPresenter is provided as an open-source project without warranties. While we strive to protect your privacy and data, this service is offered "as-is" without formal legal guarantees. By using BluPresenter, you acknowledge and accept these terms.
